CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( DATE_OF_HOUSE_BL_ISSUED__c ), '', TEXT(DAY( DATE_OF_HOUSE_BL_ISSUED__c )) + '-'+ CASE( MONTH( DATE_OF_HOUSE_BL_ISSUED__c ) , 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", 12, "Dec", "None") + '-' + RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR( DATE_OF_HOUSE_BL_ISSUED__c )), 2) )
CustomField.label: Formatted Date Of H B/L Issued
